column4: Hi all, I have been reading up on and trying different media players in ubuntu. Rythmbox seems buggy, banshee sounds horrible, songbird has stopped l;inux development and amarok requires to many kde libraries. That leaves exaile which is sluggish. is there a media player/library management/playlist management tool for Gnome tahts solid, fast, feature rich and stable?
vlc doesnt do good library mangement
